item.description:
HEY: This is the same event as the Boston Ultimate Frisbee meetup, which you can view in full here:
http://ultimatefrisbe...

The BUF group is going the way of the dodo, except that the dodo is MERGING into our beloved Illuminated group, to form one huge sweaty pile of nocturnal AND diurnal disc action called BOSTON FRISBEE! Before it disappears forever, you can read the deal on BUF's message board: http://ultimatefrisbe...

Look for all future Sunday afternoon games to be scheduled right here. And keep your eyes peeled for more updates from your friendly neighborhood Boston Frisbee organizers.

So come play with us! Here's what is in store for you:

  • 4:00 - Toss the disc around, meet folks, be merry
  • 4:15 - Overview of the rules, safety, etc - then divide into teams
  • 4:20/4:30 - Play!!!!!!
  • 6:15 - Conclude the meetup with snacks and socializing

Here's what we humbly ask of you (works great as a checklist):

  • Please RSVP so we can accommodate accordingly
  • Please bring water! The sun, it burns!
  • Please arrive on time if you can
  • If you are a regular, please consider bringing a buck for the Frisbee Fund

As usual, we will supply the frisbees, cones, first aid supplies (hopefully will never be used) and our pretty smiles. As we periodically mention, all these supplies are paid out-of-pocket by your loving Frisbee organizers and everyone has been so generous with their donations to-date. Thank you and let's keep the dream alive!

-Jim & Dan
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be tossing discs on or near the softball fields.
item.why: We're fun. It's nice out. You love frisbee, and we love you.
item.name: Sunday Afternoon Frisbee
